roleset.name: do homework assignments

role.descr: course or subject, homework for what?

example.name: verbal rel
example.text: Hey miss , are you done homeworking and around and free tomorrow night ?

example.name: Within LVC
example.text: *PRO* before you take off , do your homework .

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Our resident sophomore, who just finished a history assignment, told me she's behind in her homework for a science class.

roleset.note: HOMEWORK-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from homework.01-v)
HOMEWORK-N NOTES: Based on instances in nouns-lv. Comparison to research, study. No corresponding VN class. (from homework.01-n)
